title: College Mathematics Proficiency Enhancement Program Using Online Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level foundational mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Students engage in blended asynchronous/synchronous classes using personal devices (BYOD) and perform math problem-solving activities based on the 5E instructional model.

learning_goals: Students can generate interest in mathematical topics and explain basic concepts through mobile-based asynchronous learning materials
Students can present collaborative problem-solving processes for complex mathematical problems with peers via real-time video sessions
Students can self-directly expand learning content in flipped learning environments and achieve over 80% proficiency in assessment tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
